version_description: New Arma 3 Map: Abramia
iZurvive is now also available for ARK, Conan Exiles and PU Battlegrounds
Map & Lootmap Update for DayZ 0.62

-) Updated navigation panel on iPhone
-) Fixed landscape bugs on iPad
-) Some updates for iOS 11
-) General performance improvements
-) Fixed a potential crash when an error occured while posting / moving markers
-) Fix a crash on iPad when changing group color
Update of third party libraries and small bugfixes

New Arma 3 Maps:

Dingor
Fallujah
Kunduz
Lingor
Lythium
Malden
Porto
Sahrani
Takistan
Takistan Mountains
Taunus
Update for GDPR
The Russian City Names are now displayed again in the search list
Fixed a crash when deleting markers
Update Map for DayZ 0.63

-) Map Update for DayZ 0.63.148605
-) A bug has been fixed when trying to join a group with no username set
Lootmap Update for DayZ 1.04
-) Update Citynames

-) Location names are now displayed above loot icons and can be toggled on/off in the loot filter
-) Fixed some wrong spellings for location names
-) Updates for newest iOS Version
-) Updates for new iPhones
-) Fixed an issue with map downloads

-) Update Lootmap Data
-) Update Location Data

-) Update for DayZ Beta
-) Fixed some memory leaks when changing maps
-) New Lootmap Category for Base Building Materials

-) Fix a layout issue in the loot filter on iPhones in landscape orientation
-) Present the location search as popover on iPads
-) The search now uses the correct coordinate system, so you can search for locations by their in-game coordinate
-) Lootmap Update

-) New Loottype: School(Urban), Boathouse(Coast) and Shipwreck(Coast)
-) Renamed Loottypes to match in-game names
-) Limited time "Alpha Skin Pack" with Holiday Skin
-) Fix an issue where a new marker was not immediately displayed on the map after being created
-) Update Citynames
-) Lootmap Update for DayZ 1.01

-) Lootmap Update for DayZ 1.02
-) New Vehicle: Olga 24
-) The "Show on map" link in the wiki now opens the map in the app and sets the loot filter accordingly
Lootmap Update for DayZ 1.04
New Map: Deer Isle

Update for DayZ 1.05
New Loottype: Camp
Fix a Crash when opening Search
Update DeerIsle for most recent Version

* New Workshop Map: Chiemsee
* New Look for the Map Manager

* New Map: Livonia
* Update Chernarus for DayZ 1.06
-) Lootmap Update for Livonia, added some missing Gas Stations
Fixed a bug that prevented scrolling in the skin selection when many skins are unlocked
- Lootmap Updates for DayZ 1.07

- New Loottype: Castles
- New Loottype: Amusement Parks

* Improved join/create group error feedback
* Added settings
-) You can now share & join groups via Deeplinks

* Fixed an issue where joining a new group did not immediately display that group's markers
* Fixed an issue where checking for map updates was delayed
* Updated Networking Code
- Update Community Map Chiemsee
Small Bugfix for Deeplinks
* Update DeerIsle Map
* Fix lootmap offset on Livonia

* Add heading information to distance measurement tool
* Add ability to share open links to specific locations
* Fix an issue with distance measurement introduced in the last version

* Design Update for Location Search
* Design Update for Location Serch Info
* Design Update for Distance Measurement Info
* Drop support for iOS 9
* Drop support for iOS 10
* Fix a crash when leaving a group

* Update Chernarus & Livonia for DayZ 1.08
* Extensive Update to Locations on Chernarus
* Now showing Location Type in the Locations list
* Small fixes to the new Locations
* Splitscreen support on iPad
* Fix icon color for iOS 12

* Fix issue with icons disappearing when navigating
* Fix potential crashes when deleting markers, leaving a group or changing visibility/color of a group
iZurvive now supports dark mode

* Update for DayZ 1.09 (Chernarus, Livonia)
* Fix: Marker labels are now above City Names
* Fix: Zooming fully out on the map now works correctly
* Fix: Deer Isle and Dingor can now have distinct markers

* Lootmap Update for Chernarus and Livonia with new Landmarks: Tower Crane and PA System
* Fix coordinate search to accept `x / y` format as well
Markers in your groups are now updated immediately and automatically - no more manual refresh necessary!

* Its finally possible to post multiple markers with the same name to a group!
* You can now toggle group visibility directly from the filter on the map
* Fix some crashes related to markers introduced in the last update

• Updated lootmap for Chernarus and Livonia for DayZ 1.10 and added:
• M3S vehicle
• Vehicle wrecks
• Christmas tree
• Updated lootmap for DeerIsle (4.2b) and added:
• Crates
• Ambulance
• Food truck
Fixed a potential crash when updating maps
Added new Namalsk Workshop Map for DayZ Standalone

Shape Markers!
You can now create various shapes (areas, circles, lines) on the map and share them with your group!

Additional changes:
* Location- and coordinate links without zoom level are now allowed
* Fixed text rendering issue for location name labels on iOS 14
* Location name labels on satellite maps are now white for better legibility
* Fix a crash when two users tried to delete the same position marker at the same time

- Shape names are now displayed on the map
- The creator of a shape is now displayed in the shape editor
- The creator of a position marker is now displayed in the dialog when tapping a marker
- Long-Tapping a location now displays the DayZ in-game coordinate and gives you the option to share the coordinate either as link or as text

* Map Updates for DayZ 1.11 (Chernarus, Livonia)
* Map Updates for Namalsk, Deer Isle and Chiemsee
* Added Terrain Map for Chiemsee
* New Map: Rostow (Terrain and Satellite)
* Bugfix: For some group names, the invite link was generated with invalid parameters
* Fix misaligned lootmap for DeerIsle

Massive Lootmap Updates!

* The lootmap now contains all places where loot may spawn, however small
* You can now long-tap on a loot icon on the map to view more infos
* Infos include images and exact loot usages and categories for the place
* The wiki has been updated to show the categories and usages for each item
* The behaviour of the switches in the loot filter has been updated to toggle all underlying items, but don't disable them
* Fix a potential new crash when trying to create a new marker without being in a group

New Settings Options for Lootmap!

* You can choose the size of loot icons on the map
* You can choose the style of loot icons on the map

* Clustering is now also available as Settings Option
* A potential crash when leaving the map was fixed
* Fix some potential crashes

Lootmap Updates for DayZ 1.12

Also, based on your feedback, we have further improved the new Lootmap
* Military Tents now have their own Icon
* Medical Tents now have their own Icon
* Fixed some Pubs being misplaced into the "Generic" Category
* Fixed some Stores being misplaced into the "Generic" Category
* Re-Added Hare (Rabbit) Territories
* Re-Added Hen (Chicken) Territories

* Added Workshop Map Esseker
* Lootmap Update for Chernarus: Piano House is back
* Lootmap Update for Chernarus: Small Watchtowers are now displayed as landmarks since there is no loot spawning there
* Lootmap Update for Namalsk: Added Water Pumps
Small Bugfixes
Fixed some Memory Leaks and unnecessary Network Requests
Fixed a Layout Bug introduced in the last update
Update for newest Xcode and iOS Version
Bug Fixes & Technical preparation for upcoming features

New Maps

* Takistan Plus
* Banov
* Swans Island

Map Updates
* Chernarus
* Livonia
* Esseker
* Rostow
* DeerIsle
* Crashes when opening a group invite link without a username set should now be *really* fixed

* You can create an account in order to create and join groups+
* Groups+ are linked to your account across devices
* Groups+ show members and support kicks and bans
